titles.title: Indigent Veteran Remembrance Act of 2002
To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the annual placement of memorials honoring the service in the Armed Forces of veterans who, at the time of death, were homeless or indigent.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Benefits.

bill.summary: 9/25/2002--Introduced. Indigent Veteran Remembrance Act of 2002 - Directs the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to establish a program for the placement of a unique memorial each year in four cemeteries in the United States to honor the service in the armed forces of veterans who at their time of death were homeless or indigent.Requires the Secretary to carry out such program in consultation with the Advisory Committee on Cemeteries and Memorials.
